= Mikado Method =

1. Grab a piece of paper
2. Set a goal
3. Try to achieve the goal within a timebox (5min, 10min, 15min)
	If you failed:
		a) Revert your changes (Really. Undo it. It matters. ðŸ”¥)
		b) Think about what's missing
		c) Write it down on your paper
		d) Start over from 3) with your subgoal
	If you succeeded:
		a) Commit
		b) Check the goal you achieved on paper
		c) Start over from 3) with the next unchecked subgoal
